page.title: 18 THE RECREATION GROUND
page.content: The recreation ground is a very important place in the village. Children can go to the recreation ground and do stunts on bikes instead of playing on the road and causing accidents. There are swings and slides at the recreation ground,for young children to play on.There is enough space for a game of football or cricket.On the other side of the recreation ground there are allotments.At the recreation ground there is a big grass roller.The roller is so big it needs a tractor to pull it.People of all age groups go to the recreation ground in their spare time.In the football season they have matches every week but in summer they play cricket on a more casual basis.
